general: Israel accepts new Gaza truce proposal, includes captive release, Palestinian detainee swap; 54,249 killed in Gaza since Oct 2023.
Harvard University given 30 days to contest ban on int'l student enrollment amid allegations of non-compliance & national security concerns.
Elon Musk steps down from Trump admin role, cites disappointment with large funding legislation.
politics: Albanese wins second term as Australian PM, marking a first in over 20 years. Labor projected to secure 86 seats; Dutton conceded defeat, accepting responsibility.

finance: Wall Street extended a 9-day rally, its longest in 20+ years, reclaiming losses from Trump's tariff escalation. Strong job gains & easing trade tensions fueled the surge, though Q1 economic contraction remains a concern.
